info.title: Accounts API
info.description: The Accounts API is a collection of methods used to query a customer account. It allows the developer to retrieve account-related data such as the user account balance. It should be noted that regional variations may exist - so some fields may not be returned for certain territories.

get.summary: Retrieves details of a customers account
get.description: Retrieves a limited set of customer account details. For security purposes, only a subset is supplied, which does not include fields such as security questions and answers. argFileDR1.properties argFileDR2.properties argFileGIB1.properties argFileGIB2.properties argFileGIB3.properties argFileGIB4.properties argFilePP1.properties argFilePP2.properties argFilePP3.properties argFile.properties argFilePT1.properties argFilePTE.properties argFileSCC1.properties argFileSCC2.properties argFileSCC3.properties argFileSTG.properties argFileSYS.properties CWP GatewayMigrationUtility-1.4.00-85 GatewayMigrationUtility.jar GatewayMigrationUtility.sh gmu.log inputFile.xml lib logs migratePolicy.sh migratev2CWP.sh migratev2Policy.sh retrieveCWP.sh retrievePolicy.sh updateCWP.sh updatePolicyById.sh updatePolicy.sh returned by default, others need to be selected. argFileDR1.properties argFileDR2.properties argFileGIB1.properties argFileGIB2.properties argFileGIB3.properties argFileGIB4.properties argFilePP1.properties argFilePP2.properties argFilePP3.properties argFile.properties argFilePT1.properties argFilePTE.properties argFileSCC1.properties argFileSCC2.properties argFileSCC3.properties argFileSTG.properties argFileSYS.properties CWP GatewayMigrationUtility-1.4.00-85 GatewayMigrationUtility.jar GatewayMigrationUtility.sh gmu.log inputFile.xml lib logs migratePolicy.sh migratev2CWP.sh migratev2Policy.sh retrieveCWP.sh retrievePolicy.sh updateCWP.sh updatePolicyById.sh updatePolicy.sh returned by default only in italian region.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: A unique identifier of your application that is generated by the API portal.

parameters.name: apiSecret
parameters.description: Another unique identifier for your application.

parameters.name: apiTicket
parameters.description: Ticket Granting Ticket obtained from a previous request

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify an absolute field list to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specify fields in addition to the default to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Specify fields from the default to exclude (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: territory
parameters.description: Territory from which request originates

parameters.name: languageAsPerTerritory
parameters.description: Defines response field name language, true (default) returns in language defined by territory, false returns in English

get.description: Retrieves the customer’s account payments in UK Sterling.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: A unique identifier of your application that is generated by the API portal.

parameters.name: apiSecret
parameters.description: Another unique identifier for your application.

parameters.name: apiTicket
parameters.description: Ticket Granting Ticket obtained from a previous request

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to return (Used with pageSize)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Specify the number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: dateFrom
parameters.description: The FROM datetime from payments to be returned. (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss)

parameters.name: dateTo
parameters.description: The TO datetime for payments to be returned. (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The order the response will be retuned by. i.e. date,desc

parameters.name: transactionType
parameters.description: Allows the user to select with they want to see withdrawls or deposits. If it is omitted from the query both types will be returned

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify an absolute field list to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specify fields in addition to the default to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Specify fields from the default to exclude (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: territory
parameters.description: Territory from which request originates

parameters.name: languageAsPerTerritory
parameters.description: Defines response field name language, true (default) returns in language defined by territory, false returns in English

post.summary: Sets a customer's plus card pin
post.description: Sets a customer's plus card pin

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: A unique identifier of your application that is generated by the API portal.

parameters.name: apiSecret
parameters.description: Another unique identifier for your application.

parameters.name: apiTicket
parameters.description: Ticket Granting Ticket obtained from a previous request

availableFunds.description: Current available funds in this account

currencyCode.description: A three-character ISO4217 currency code. This will be the currency that the user registered in

withdrawableFunds.description: Current withdrawable balance of this account

additionalSystemStatuses.description: Statuses of systems specific to that account - seperate from account status

birthPlace.description: Birthplace details (city, province country code) for customer - primaly used in italy

city.description: The city of the customer's address

contactable.description: Is it okay for the bookmaker to contact the customer with marketing information

country.description: The country of the customer's address

countryCode.description: A two-character ISO 3166-1-Alpha-2 code representing the customer's country of registration

county.description: The county of the customer's address

currencyCode.description: A three-character ISO4217 currency code. This will be the currency that the customer registered in

email.description: The primary email address of the customer with that account. Must be unique.

fax.description: The fax number of the customer

firstName.description: The first name of the customer with that account

language.description: The registered language of the customer

lastLogin.description: The last time customer logged in - mandatory in italy - available if populated in other territories

lastName.description: The last name of the customer with that account

mobile.description: The mobile number of the customer with that account

nif.description: The national identifcation number of the customer (italy only - mandatory response field)

partnerContactable.description: Is it okay for the bookmaker to give the user's contact details to companies with which it has partnerships

postcode.description: The postCode of the customer's address

secondLastName.description: The second last name of the customer with that account - primarily used in Spanish territory

street1.description: Line number 1 of the customer's street address written out in full

street2.description: Line number 2 of the customer's street address written out in full

street3.description: Line number 3 of the customer's street address written out in full

terms and conditions.description: name and url location of terms and conditions applicable to this account

timeZone.description: The primary time zone for the customer

title.description: The title of the name of the customer with that account

code.description: A unique William Hill identifier for the error

field.description: To help pinpoint the exact parameter where a request has failed

message.description: A unique William Hill text string to enable you to identify the error (in English only)

flagName.description: Name of the flag to set.

flagReason.description: The reason that the flag has been set.

flagValue.description: Value to set the flag to.

action.description: Action of the payment (D = Deposit, W = withdrawal)

channel.description: The channel through which the payment was made

ipAddress.description: The IP address from which the payment was made

paymentDateTime.description: The date and time when the payment was made

pinStatus.description: PIN object - if this object is not returned in plusCardDetails object then it has not been set.

plusCardDetails.description: Plus Card Details and linked accounts
